display_name: Overall RDI at 4% desat or arousal
description: RDI at 4% desat or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with arousal or >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi4pa = 60*(hremba4 +hroa4 + hnrba4 + hnroa4 +carba4+ caroa4 + canba4 + canoa4 +oarba4 +oaroa4 + oanba4 +oanoa4) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 4% desat or arousal
